name: viirs_vcmcfg_dnb_composites_v10_yearly_max
title: VIIRS Nighttime Lights
description: Yearly VIIRS day night band nighttime lights data (without stray light correction).
details: Aggregated to yearly from monthly data by taking maximum value. Pixels in monthly data without at least 3 cloud free observations were omitted.

extract_types_info.max: maximum value measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum value measured  within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.sum: sum of values measured within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Elvidge, Christopher & Baugh, Kimberly & Zhizhin, Mikhail & Chi Hsu, Feng & Tilottama, Ghosh. (2017). VIIRS night-time lights. International Journal of Remote Sensing. 1-20. 10.1080/01431161.2017.1342050.
